item.description: New: Gutenberg Changelog #71 - Grzegorz Ziolkowski @gziolo subbed for Mary Job as co-host with Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph. They discuss Gutenberg 13.8, Fluid Typography, updates to Block APIs and WordPress 6.1 Planning. https://t.co/J39yWUy4LG
item.source:markdown: New: Gutenberg Changelog #71 - Grzegorz Ziolkowski @gziolo subbed for Mary Job as co-host with Birgit Pauli-Haack @bph. They discuss Gutenberg 13.8, Fluid Typography, updates to Block APIs and WordPress 6.1 Planning. https://t.co/J39yWUy4LG
